name: Bone Katana "Wolf"
description: Improved Long Sword built on a bone base. Top edge is covered in monster fangs.

name: Iron Katana
description: Made with technology from the Orient. A strong Sword, but requires maintenance.

name: Bone
description: A normal bone sharpened into a Long Sword. Above reproach as a practice weapon.

name: Blango Destroyer
description: Long Sword made from Blango materials. Liberally uses cold resistant fur.

name: Dark Scythe
description: A sickle shaped death Scythe that can cut a wyvern in two. Treated material.

name: Wyvern Blade "Fall"
description: Wyvern Blade draped in the colors of Autumn. One stroke causes an explosion of fire.

name: Wyvern Blade "Leaf"
description: Dark green blade made from Rathian material. Incredibly sharp and powerful.

name: Tormentor
description: A sickle shaped death Scythe that can cut a wyvern in two. Treated material.

name: Saber
description: Dragon Blade with the power of Lunastra. Opponents will immolate in a blue blaze.

name: Mirage Finsword
description: Chameleos-like invisible sword. Good for hit jobs. Requires Guild's OK to own.

name: Fire Dragonsword
description: Made from Lao-Shans Horn and Firestone. A treasure. One of the dragon-killers.

name: Tigrex Tooth
description: Long Sword made from Tigrex materials. Sharp blade makes mince meat of its victims.

name: Dragonwood L.Sword
description: Made of Dragonwood, this weapon has inherited its many powers. Purifies souls.

name: Black Scythe
description: Infused with darkness's power. Wailing can be heard from underfoot when swung.

name: Centenarian Dagger
description: Awarded in honorarium by the Guild, this Sword can slice off the tail of Lao-Shan.

name: Guardian Sword
description: Replica of a Sword made during the Guild's genesis. Given to those with dignity.

name: Crab Cutter
description: Splendid Scythe made from a Daimyo's claw which rips through hide and flesh.

name: Great Hornfly Saber
description: Made from insects, this Long Sword shines like the sun. It makes short work of bugs.

name: dummy (LS Fan "Gavas")
description: dummy.

name: Demon Halberd
description: Made with the secrets of Oriental monks. Golden color holds a warrior's spirit.

name: Hidden Saber
description: A very dark Long Sword. It cuts best in trained hands. How its made is a secret.

name: Icesteel Blade
description: Freezing Long Sword. Snow was folded in so many times, the blade leaves none alive.

name: Akantor Katana
description: Long Sword with the power of a black deity. Those with it feel otherworldly.

name: Liquid Fire Blade
description: Lavasioth Long Sword. Sharp and strong; breaks through tock like a torrent of lava.

name: Aqua Guardian
description: Advanced water Long Sword. Crafting technique found in ancient sunken ruins.

name: WyvernBlade"Silver"
description: A cool blade that heats you to the core. Beauty and violence all in one sword.

name: Lost Black Katana
description: Legends say that by merely landing on its supreme edge a bug will be cut in two.

name: AncientDragonwoodLS
description: Translucent sword made of ancient Dragonwood. Seems to cut without touching.

name: dummy (Amezari Blade)
description: dummy.

name: dummy (Pirate Sword J)
description: dummy.

name: Bone G
description: Crafted through the newest techniques, its shape is the same, but now it's G-Level.

name: Ukanlos Slicer
description: Embodiment of the white god's 4th power: its roar. A slash can part the seas.
